alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 26 at 12:20AM PST until December 26 at 12:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County and Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated wind gusts in excess of 65 mph possible, particularly in the higher terrain. Wind gusts have been observed over 60 mph at Rachel, NV.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County
